500.title: Oops! Something went wrong :)
500.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try again later.

503.title: Website is under maintenance!
503.description: The site is not available at the moment. We'll be back online shortly.

403.title: Access Forbidden
403.description: You don't have necessary permission to view this resource.

401.title: Unauthorized Access
401.description: Please log in with the appropriate credentials to access this resource.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.
